= findzone =

== Syntax ==
 zoneptr findzone( s : string )

== Parameters ==
; s : string
: The name of the zone to find.

== Return Value ==
Returns a zoneptr to the zone, or null if the zone is not found.

== Description ==
This function finds and returns a zone pointer based on the zone name. The zone name should be the name of the zone without any file extension or path.

If the zone is not found, the function returns null.

== Example ==
=== Example 1: Find Zone by Name ===
 z := findzone("midgaard");

=== Example 2: Find Current Zone ===
 // Get the current room's zone
 u := self.outside;
 while (u.type != UNIT_ST_ROOM)
     u := u.outside;
 z := findzone(u.zone);

=== Example 3: Complete Zone Reset Command ===
 dilbegin cmd_reset(arg : string);
 var
    z : zoneptr;
    u : unitptr;
 code
 {
    if (arg == "")
    {
       u := self.outside;
       while (u.type != UNIT_ST_ROOM)
           u := u.outside;
       z := findzone(u.zone);
    }
    else
    {
       z := findzone(arg);
    }

    if (z == null)
    {
        sendtext("Could not find a zone named "+ arg + "<br/>", self);
        quit;
    }

    sendtext("Resetting zone "+ z.name + "<br/>", self);
    zonereset(z);

    quit;
 } dilend
